encode

Class GZipHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • encode.GZipHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Zipper

    public class GZipHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements Zipper
    This class contains methods to support GZipping. GZipping is compressing one single file. See the Wikipedia page on GZip and the GZipping guide for more information on GZip.

    See the ZipHandler class for methods to aid in Zipping. Zipping can compress multiple files to one single file where GZipping can only compress one file.

    Since:
    21-8-2014
    Version:
    22-8-2014
    Author:
    stefanboodt
    See Also:
    ZipHandler, GZIPInputStream, GZIPOutputStream, BufferedReader, FileWriter
